website_summaries.verdict: The best budget, high quality car alarm with advanced security features.
pros: Failsafe starter kill prevents the engine for running at the press of a button
Alarm system flashes to indicate ready state when the alarm system has been set
cons: Alarm can be difficult to install on older vehicles without professional assistance

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't include siren
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on July (2018) and then, installed another one which was given as a present. So I left the package as is and now (on January 2019), when I needed in this product, I've found that there is no siren in the package. Better to give as a gift than using when you know that there is missing elements (being fooled).
customer_reviews.author: DanZ

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer, had a friend install as the instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy customer, had a friend install as the instructions were a bit confusing to me. I did not have several hours to figure this out although I'm pretty sure I could have installed myself. My friend took about 45 min and had everything working great! I love how my doors lock and unlock when I start the car and shut off. The horn chirp is perfect, not too loud and annoying. Keyless buttons work great. Little hard to activate but I assume it's designed to be that way so you don't accidentally hit the button, takes the tip of your finger to press correctly.
customer_reviews.author: J.James

customer_reviews.title: This damn thing works
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for a no frills, basic car alarm at a decent price then that's what you're going to get here. I bought this device to replace a dealer installed alarm on my mom's car and was able to install it myself. I had never installed an alarm before in my life but I had purposely purchased this alarm since it basically had the same functions as the existing one and simply replaced it piece by piece and ultimately, it worked. The keyless entry devices have a strong signal and I can arm/disarm from a good distance away and I have never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive way to add keyless entry to a cheap car without it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of those disposable Kia Hamster cars to rack up miles for the business and then throw away and while it came with power windows and locks, it did not have keyless entry. I picked this up to be able to pop the back hatch/trunk. Works great and now we have keyless entry. Took about 1.5 hours to install in the hamster and a little googling found us the right wiring diagram on kia forums to wire everything super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Capt T

customer_reviews.title: Worst amazon purchase I ever made
customer_reviews.text: Worst amazon purchase I ever made. I had this professionally installed on my 2010 Chevy cobalt and now less than 2 weeks later I'm having to buy a new product as well as pay installation fees again because the car wont lock, un lock or open the trunk unless I'm standing right by the driver door. Dont order it's a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Arron Whala

customer_reviews.title: It works atleast
customer_reviews.text: This worked well in my car until about 2 weeks ago. It was running perfectly then one day it just stopped working out of the blue! had a mechanic look at it and they only said the receiver seemed not to work! it worked for a good amount of time on my end
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Works great and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great. It replaced my failing factory security system in a Mitsubishi Challenger. The remote is small and light (if a little cheap-feeling), and the module is simple to wire (almost everything is built-in).
customer_reviews.author: Stagea

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the 3100LX, its installed in my 1989 ford f250. Only thing I wish it didn't do was honk the horn a bunch when you unlock it. Much better than the viper system I had on it. if you have it, its very much worth upgrading it to just get the remote with separate unlock and lock buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Fordtruckfan89

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 1999 chevrolet metro. Used aftermarket electric door locks so i had to install my own realys. I have been using my car everyday for the past 3 months with no issues. For the price this alarm works exactly as described. If u have not installed an alarm before you will have a hard time with the instructions. They arnt that great. Directions did have a link for website that did have a better overview of the wiring diagram.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Leo Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm and good value.
customer_reviews.text: Wired in great. One of the easiest alarms to do. Not a lot of wiring. Works really well. I had to adjust the sensitivity to about 1/4 on the dial. It is very sensitive. It does not come with the siren. I wired it to the factory horn but it sounds stupid. I purchased the dei electronics siren and works great
customer_reviews.author: Suzukirm25097

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm without all the useless features.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. For people that don't know, Directed electronics makes both Avital and Viper alarms. I think most of the bad reviews is from people that don't know how to install this correctly themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Grease Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional so I have a different perspective on the install. The product worked like all the other DEI made units I've done. The price was right and it worked so I don't think you can't ask for anything else! I installed it in a vehicle I was selling to replace the old one that quit and I can't get parts for any more. I wired it to utilize the remote start feature of the old one that still worked. If I needed one again I would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Kansastwister

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm system
customer_reviews.text: I'm replacing it from a old alarm. The wiring color is same as the old one. This system don't come with the siren. But I already have one from the old system.
customer_reviews.author: fuji

customer_reviews.title: This is a great alarm for a great price.  Install it with all features to protect the vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I have installed these in a lot of my cars and it works great. The LX model does not come w/siren and will use the car horn. Add a siren later and you can make both work. I recommend this alarm system.
customer_reviews.author: Gandude

customer_reviews.title: Randomly goes off
customer_reviews.text: It is a cheap keyless entry alarm system. Had it professionally installed. Now the alarm goes off randomly at times in the middle of the night. Very annoying. You get what you pay for! Don't expect to be 100% satisfied. If I would have known, I would have spent more on a reliable car alarm and not on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: From company that makes viper. Instructions were helpful, don’t buy Chinese made alarms, there instructions won’t be as easy to understand as this one. Tip tape up wires you don’t think you will use, this way it’s easier to install. I only had to install four wires and hook up door locks.
customer_reviews.author: Ha Thoi

customer_reviews.title: False alarm in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old alarm that was the same brand. The old one kept going off whenever it was cold. Unfortunately this one does the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It seems like this automatic starter doesn't last that long, this is the third one that had to put on my 2008 Ford F150
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Problems with tech support
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find color code instructions online for whatever car you are or truck you are hooking up this makes it difficult for your average do it yourself despite the warnings that the warranty will become iffy if you do it yourself
customer_reviews.author: tommybibbins

customer_reviews.title: Used the remotes only.
customer_reviews.text: Local company wants to charge $70 dollars for an extra remote. Bought this unit with two remotes and reprogrammed them.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: excellent value) on a Chevy Monte Carlo 2001
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on Amazon and got it installed at bestbuy (Did you know you can do that! excellent value) on a Chevy Monte Carlo 2001. Works great. One star less since the buttons are cheaply made and not very easy to press.
customer_reviews.author: Siroco

customer_reviews.title: Great car alarm
customer_reviews.text: Really like the alarm system came with everything as promised. First time diy install on a Acura integra. Took me a little bit to figure out what was under dash. Very happy will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Martinez

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: professional install, works very well in my tiburon 2008 open and close all doors.
customer_reviews.author: jacob martinez

customer_reviews.title: 1999 Jeep Cherokee XJ
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in a 1999 Jeep Cherokee XJ without any issue. After wiring it in, i plugged in the module and it started clicking. I didnt realize it was arming itself so after i thought about i disarmed with the remote and continued the install. I would recommend to anyone. Not sure why i thought it came with a siren but its still a steal at 30 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Luke J Lovato

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Alarm - No siren included.
customer_reviews.text: Basic alarm with on-board cut-off relay for starter disabling; It does not include a siren, has (-) out to horn relay. Remote controls are smaller than normal size remotes but buttons are easy to find. Reversible output to door lock pulses both (+) and (-). I had to use additional relays to add resistor. Overall it's a good alarm for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: The manual online is more helpful than the one that comes in the box but all in all I'm pretty happy with it. Good price, easy to install, works great. No issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jessee Padilla

customer_reviews.title: What more can you ask for from a $45.00 alarm?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the same unit that only had 1 transmitter. I unplugged the original one, and plugged in the new one. It worked just fine. It’s a great basic alarm. Keeps the neighborhood kids out of my car, and allows me to unlock/lock the car remotely. What more can you ask for from a $45.00 alarm?
customer_reviews.author: John Clymer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace my 98 Regal’s original alarm system. It’s very sensitive to movements and loud sounds. Triggers the locks’ and opens the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: I returned it but it did look like a decent product
customer_reviews.text: NOT REMOTE START!!!! Only adds keyless entry to vehicle. I returned it but it did look like a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Like, Really Smart

customer_reviews.title: This is not a remote starter... just a alarm
customer_reviews.text: the ad is misleading.. Avital 3100LX 3-Channel Keyless Entry Car Alarm with Remotes and Failsafe Starter Kill-Set by Directed Electronics 4.0 out of 5 stars 557 customer reviews | 1000+ answered questions Amazon's Choice for "remote starters for cars"
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product . You have to install a fuel relay for the door locks and a diode for the dome light and high beams.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great units and work well.. I'm a professional installer and use these for inexpensive installs and they work fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Travis

customer_reviews.title: No Siren
customer_reviews.text: Did not like that it did not come with a siren
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lacking instructions good product otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Easy install after researching which wires needed to be used. Instructions leave a lot to be desired. Working flawless otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Jason p

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great features for the price. Install was easy as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Defiant

customer_reviews.title: Not a remote starter
customer_reviews.text: It advertises that it is a remote starter for your vehicle but that is an alarm system. You have to get another piece if equipment for the remote starter.
customer_reviews.author: Kimme

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Got the right box filled with remotes for a different brand remote starter
customer_reviews.author: shane gurski

customer_reviews.title: very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: The product I ordered was not what I received. I ordered the unit with the fail safe starter kit, WAS NOT IN THE BOX
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Simply
customer_reviews.text: Just needed a replacement as my 2100 stopped working this was a easy swap and plug and play. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery. Comes with warranty. For price it is a good item. Saves time.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Comes with warranty. For price it is a good item. Saves time.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Banks

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 2 months then randomly quit working and started smoking at the brain box...
customer_reviews.author: Saint_Callione

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Junk product. after having it professionally installed. dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: 2004 Civic LX
customer_reviews.text: Works great nothing else needed just follow a wiring color diagram from the internet.
customer_reviews.author: RAUL LOAYZA

customer_reviews.title: chose this over a dozen no name units
customer_reviews.text: The remotes are kind of cheesey but the unit looks fine. the install instructions were adequate NO tech support and my only complaint was that it has so many other options im never going to use,,, i ended up cutting off half the wires they gave. It was a brand name at a great price I have had it about a year now and it still works fine so im giving it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: exconsul

customer_reviews.title: Larry
customer_reviews.text: I have been sick and have not hooked it yet. The keyless box is fine thank you.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to come with the siren it did not have the siren
customer_reviews.author: seanpaul taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great basic alarm
customer_reviews.text: I've been using DEI alarms for years. I just needed a basic alarm to protect my car. I choose this due to the price, company reputation and ease of installation. I didn't realize that this particular alarm didn't come with a siren, but you can hook up the vehicle horn to it. It does have a wire for a siren output if you decide to put one in.
customer_reviews.author: Abek21

customer_reviews.title: the sensitivity is too low on this product, have ...
customer_reviews.text: the sensitivity is too low on this product, have to hit the car real hard for it to go off.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: no siren???? don't know why.........
customer_reviews.text: A lil bummed that this is the first alarm system i received without a siren? Why is that? Don't know why they wouldn't state that on the description at all. Very disappointed cause i don't like using factory horn.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Acosta

customer_reviews.title: I would like to have company contact me
customer_reviews.text: Stop working after 3 months. I would like to have company contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ball

customer_reviews.title: My mailing cost $ 7.15
customer_reviews.text: I payed 7.15 to mail it back IAM going to order the viper alarm
customer_reviews.author: Terry Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome alarms! Like the separate lock unlock on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome alarms! Like the separate lock unlock on the remotes. Good range of distance! Swapped this in place of my Autopage alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car alarm
customer_reviews.text: Awesome car alarm.One of many best buys Amazon has on line.Had it installed two weeks ago and it's working very good.
customer_reviews.author: Papi

customer_reviews.title: So far its been reliable and hasnt had any false alarms or issues with arming/disarming itself like the CrimeStopper did
customer_reviews.text: Installed this to replace a CrimeStopper SP-101 system. Works as expected and comes with clear instructions. So far its been reliable and hasnt had any false alarms or issues with arming/disarming itself like the CrimeStopper did.
customer_reviews.author: rubberto

customer_reviews.title: I bet it is a good product. But not for my car
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I thought I was getting . I bet it is a good product. But not for my car . Was unable to send back in the time frame that was aloud. Was very sick at that time I still have it . Don't know what to do with it now .
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Can & should be installed by professional. I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Can & should be installed by professional. I tried over several days to install it myself, but gave up & removed & repaired damage to wiring system.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Williams

customer_reviews.title: I didn't give one star because of product I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give one star because of product I thought it was a remote start so I didn't yous it please don't consider the star the product
customer_reviews.author: Donald Westgate III

customer_reviews.title: wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was an auto stat, keyless entry and alarm, wrong 👎 this product will not start your car now I have to buy an auto start and keyless entry. I think it should have said this will not start your car.
customer_reviews.author: chee

customer_reviews.title: No siren
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with siren but works good with factory horn
customer_reviews.author: rlg

customer_reviews.title: No warranty for the DIY.
customer_reviews.text: First one was defective after wiring everything up. SMH. Didn't honk like it should and programming didn't work. Decided to get a second one and return the first because I didn't want to go thru with the hassle of undoing. So far the second unit is sort of working like it should. Sometimes it will auto lock/unlock when ignition is on or off. It's is a feature with this unit. But it is supposed to be off. I bought a crimestopper 202 five years ago for the same price with absolutely no issues. This was unit is slapped with "Amazon choice". It should be slapped with "no warranty or Tech support from the manufacture". You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: CCHHIN

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and works like a charm...already!
customer_reviews.text: They recommend installation by professionals only, keep that in mind. In my opinion, if you're familiar with aftermarket auto electronics it's pretty straight forward. Like any project, read the instructions and do your research ahead of time to find out where the necessary wires are located for your vehicle and what they look like. With that and having the basic install tools makes it about a two hour install. I've added alarms in the past but these new products are much simpler, offer more capability and actually work!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Know what you're doing or don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Avital for years and have loved them but they completely have taken away all end user support. Luckily I know how to install them and this unit is really a 5 star unit. Be aware there is no siren. Directed Electronics makes nice stuff but taking away end user support will tarnish my reviews of them until it returns (probably won't).
customer_reviews.author: Josh L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Come with Siren
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on a 92 accord and did not need to reprogram or add any additional hardware. Overall a good product and no complaints so far. Here are the most important things to note: 1) Does not come with a siren. Instead, this system is intended to hook into your car horn to give you the lock/unlock chirps. 2) It does not come with a separate starter interrupt relay. Instead, the circuitry to interrupt the starter is integrated into the main unit. I was skeptical of this and decided not to use it on my install 3) The remotes are preprogrammed and so you dont need to worry about programming them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good system
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine with a good set of essential features. A good upgrade for the Clifford system that I installed some 30 years ago. The installation guide leaves me a hit wanting, though. Many of the wires are not adequately described.
customer_reviews.author: amborg

customer_reviews.title: Avital 3100LX in NIssan 300ZX 32
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 300ZX Z32 and it worked great but you need to know that this alarm is so cheap, not because it is bad, but because it does not include the alarm siren nor the electric doors controller, so if your car doesn't have this please note that you will need them. Great alarm so far.
customer_reviews.author: Guil B

customer_reviews.title: But I was just happy to be able to lock my car doors again
customer_reviews.text: My 2004 Civic never had keyless entry and the locks started to malfunction (again). It was over $200 to fix the locks at the dealership, so at this price + install cost through GeekSquad (Best Buy), installing the keyless entry was a steal. The car horn does beep when you lock it, so if you live in a very quiet neighborhood that could be disruptive. But I was just happy to be able to lock my car doors again!
customer_reviews.author: dw

customer_reviews.title: No siren included
customer_reviews.text: This product included no siren!... Now here is the issue, what is an alarm system without a siren?? Thats like selling a grilled cheese sandwich without the cheese
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great to use on door poppers
customer_reviews.text: Avital keyless entry must know what you are doing to install this we own a audio store and it was a breeze we used it with door poppers on a shaved door install the range is good conpaired to other keyless systems
customer_reviews.author: Bryan May

customer_reviews.title: Flawless install
customer_reviews.text: Installed flawlessly. Clear instructions were widely available online, and DEI seems to follow a sort of installation commonality between their products, which makes installation even easier. This particular model did not include a siren; instead using the horn output to alert the user to lock/unlock and panic. For the price, this can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value from a good brand!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Directed Electronics products for years. Easy to install, setup and customize. Remotes feel sturdy and are not bulky; they have pretty good range too. Keyless entry, dedicated trunk release and horn honk all from a reputable company like Directed for $30? What's there to complain about?
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Avital alarms are made from DEI who makes VIPER, CLIFFORD, & PYTHON. Its their lowest end but if you just want something basic and don't want to spend much it's great. The range and response to buttons lag over time so I always say if it's for a cheap car or planning to sell a car this is great otherwise I'd go with VIPER or others.
customer_reviews.author: Tron

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I already installed it in my Honda and works great, I’ve had problem with the first one but they change the module in 48 hs. So it’s a great product for a cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more
customer_reviews.text: If you go to a shop there alarms start around $200. For what? A name? Not this guy i have these on 2 dump trucks and a car. Not one single issue. If im within a football field of my cars this will reach it
customer_reviews.author: tod

customer_reviews.title: Everything working great now.
customer_reviews.text: Had some trouble with at first not working properly, automatic unlock and lock didn't work properly and the battery was being drained quickly. This was purchased to replace a non functioning, previously installed unit. Just had to unplug the old one and plug in the replacement. Everything working great now.
customer_reviews.author: Skitzoid Hobo

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a month. It now sets the alarm but will not activate the door locks. It still unlocks the doors but doesnt lovk them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher farrar

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed for my truck. I wanted to be able to lock my 93 Chevy and not worry abt it and this works well.
customer_reviews.author: LT Jones Jr.

customer_reviews.title: DEI quality, great price.. (spend a little extra to get the built in door lock relays to save time/hassle)
customer_reviews.text: Added power door lock actuators (with relays) and now my 17 year old Miata feels like a modern car!
customer_reviews.author: FrankP

customer_reviews.title: Can't install it yourself
customer_reviews.text: No way to install yourself had to buy a part to go with it cost me and extra $20 plus $100 to get it installed
customer_reviews.author: Lineer P.

customer_reviews.title: Better instructions would help
customer_reviews.text: No siren included. Wiring directions are vague, other than that it's decent.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a Bulldog cheap system and it was terrible. This avital system is perfect and BestBuy installed for 80 bucks. Makes my life so much easier and the trunk button is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: jordan mutis

customer_reviews.title: It is an older model although the key fobs work ...
customer_reviews.text: It is an older model although the key fobs work with my even older system I have in my car. I found I could buy 2 fobs for the same price or higher than this complete kit. I may swap it over in the future to the new brain box as well, the wiring is identical.
customer_reviews.author: OutsideObserver

customer_reviews.title: Great price.  Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality product and a really good price. The installation is easy if you know what you are doing. It could come with better instructions but the overall product is great.
customer_reviews.author: E. Negron

customer_reviews.title: as for this alarm easy install but siren in small and very low tone
customer_reviews.text: I have been an installer for 25 plus years, Ive installed a lot of alarms, as for this alarm easy install but siren in small and very low tone.
customer_reviews.author: Lunamar Electronics

customer_reviews.title: Basic alarm
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Works fine so far. Don't like the hoking noise, would have preferred siren sounds instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaican_Gal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt a remote start only a car door opener, was my mistake, returned it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan V.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I hope it last life time
customer_reviews.text: I have successfully installed it myself without any problems. It took me close to four hours to install cos I wanted to do aa go job. If you are wondering which car I installed on, its a 2003 toyota corolla.So far so good. I hope it last life time.
customer_reviews.author: Kofi02gh

customer_reviews.title: easy install from my audio guy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. had it for almost a month, no problems yet. easy install from my audio guy. Saved a lot of $$ buying here and having someone install instead of letting the shop do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kotee

customer_reviews.title: broke in the first hour,
customer_reviews.text: broke in the first hour, note to all if you press lock on the doors and unlock on the remote it shorts the whole unit
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good alarm. Very nice price. I used and is good. You need Professional instalation and program.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have it on my car only thing you guys might want to change is the red into a blue one it gives more of a warning because it's more visible at night
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Works as expected. Please be aware that this doesn't include a siren.
customer_reviews.author: amunoz712

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a very simple, entry level alarm... very easy to install and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price will buy again soon
customer_reviews.text: Great product , great price will buy again soon !
customer_reviews.author: Southtexas24

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to all Very easy install Make sure have wiring ...
customer_reviews.text: Recommend to all Very easy install Make sure have wiring diagram for vehicle
customer_reviews.author: JACK

customer_reviews.title: good alarm
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is made by DEI that more can I say! I have installed this alarm long ah dir \ ferent car! is cheaper but has the same viper quality!
customer_reviews.author: OMAR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
